page.title: 03The Clinic
page.content: For our Domesday project we decided to do about the Hillmorton Clinic.It has been open for about fifteen years.When it was first opened it was run by the Warwickshire County Council.In 1974 the clinic was taken over by the local Health Authority.Mrs Morgan is the person we interviewed and she showed us around.She is a Health Visitor and enjoys her job very much.Most of her patients are under five years of age. When people need a doctor they ring the clinic.They also have groups for mothers and babies,and there is a pram shelter outside in case of a wet day. You can also visit the dentist here.
